comment.text: This translation key is used to display the label "SSO" in various places within the application, such as badges and filters, indicating that the account login type is Single Sign-On. It appears on the contacts page, specifically in a filter component, and is also used in an info panel. Translators should provide a translation for this key that describes SSO in their native language.

usage.context:
{isSSO ? (
 <>
 <Badge
 id="sso-badge-info-panel"
 className="sso-badge"
 label={t("Common:SSO")}
 color={globalColors.white}
 backgroundColor={
 theme.isBase
 ? globalColors.secondGreen
 : globalColors.secondGreenDark

/>
 {profile.isSSO ? (
 <div className="badges-wrapper">
 <Badge
 className="sso-badge"
 label={t("Common:SSO")}
 color={globalColors.white}
 backgroundColor={
 theme.isBase
 ? globalColors.secondGreen
 : globalColors.secondGreenDark

/>
 {profile.isSSO ? (
 <div className="badges-wrapper">
 <Badge
 className="sso-badge"
 label={t("Common:SSO")}
 color={globalColors.white}
 backgroundColor={
 theme.isBase
 ? globalColors.secondGreen
 : globalColors.secondGreenDark

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While '单点登录' accurately conveys 'Single Sign-On', the inclusion of '(SSO)' within the Chinese translation is redundant since the English abbreviation is already provided in the key name 'Common:SSO'.
